title: Blue Origin CEO Smith to step down
summary: Bob Smith, chief executive of Blue Origin, will resign from the company in December and be replaced by Dave Limp, the Amazon executive who had been overseeing development of its Project Kuiper constellation.

title: Jeff Bezos finally got rid of Bob Smith at Blue Origin
summary: "I am confident that Blue Origin's greatest achievements are still ahead of us."

title: BREAKING! Jeff Bezos Announces New Blue Origin CEO In Message To Employees
summary: Jeff Bezos has informed all Blue Origin employees via message that Bob Smith will be retiring and Dave Limp, a key Amazon executive will be taking over as CEO on December 4th.

title: Jeff Bezos’ Blue Origin to replace CEO Bob Smith with former Amazon exec Dave Limp
summary: Jeff Bezos’ Blue Origin will replace CEO Bob Smith with former Amazon executive Dave Limp, CNBC has learned.

title: Jeff Bezos’ Blue Origin to replace CEO Bob Smith with outgoing Amazon exec Dave Limp
summary: Jeff Bezos’ Blue Origin will replace CEO Bob Smith with outgoing Amazon executive Dave Limp, CNBC has learned.

title: UAE’s $5 billion commitment opens doors for Yahsat
summary: Yahsat is considering expanding into new satellite markets after the UAE government made a $5.1 billion pledge to buy broadband services from the Emirati fleet operator until at least 2043.

title: U.S. Space Force and Astroscale to co-invest in a refueling satellite
summary: Astroscale has signed an agreement with the U.S. Space Force to co-invest in an on-orbit refueling vehicle.

title: Sierra Space raising nearly $300 million from Japanese consortium at $5 billion valuation
summary: Sierra Space, the subsidiary of private aerospace contractor Sierra Nevada Corporation, is finalizing a raise of nearly $300 million, CNBC has learned.

title: Italian Launch Startup Sidereus Space Raises €5.1M in Seed+ Funding
summary:
Italian launch startup Sidereus Space Dynamics has closed a €5.1 Million Seed+ investment round. The company aims to utilize the funding to conduct its pre-flight and flight test development phases. Sidereus Space is developing EOS, a single-stage-to-orbit rocket that the company touts as “the personal computer of launch vehicles.” The 3.5-metre tall vehicle is designed […]
The post Italian Launch Startup Sidereus Space Raises €5.1M in Seed+ Funding appeared first on European Spaceflight.

title: NASA Names New Head of Technology, Policy, Strategy
summary: NASA Administrator Bill Nelson announced Monday Charity Weeden will serve as associate administrator for the agency’s Office of Technology, Policy, and Strategy (OTPS), effective immediately. Weeden succeeds Bhavya Lal, who left the agency in July, and Ellen Gertsen, who had been serving as the office’s acting leader since then.
